item.description:
Creating Abundance in Your Life

Celebrate my birthday too!

Learn and practice and focus on creating abundance in your life. Bring into your life what you want with affirmations, clear goals, visualization, living as if..., keeping a positive focus, living in the moment, etc. We'll focus on other tips and techniques to make your life abundant relationally, physically, emotionally, aesthetically, intellectually, financially, materially, spiritually and any other way that supports your soul and body.

7:00 to 8:30 optional fabulous macrobiotic dinner with dessert by famous chef David Snieckus for an additional $20. Call me 1 day in advance to register for the meal. If not dinner, you can purchase dessert for $5.

Celebrate Herb's birthday too which happens at 9:35pm. We can celebrate after as an option.

$30, sliding scale to $15
item.name: Creating Abundance in Your Life
